attributes.additional_details:
Please sign and share this petition to help towards saving Hemsbys Coastline and gathering enough signatures to try and raise awareness that the unfortunate residents of hemsby beach lost their houses and need everyone's support in getting the government to take responsibility of their community and open their eyes to the fact that this is real life devastation happening as we speak, and we can't do it alone.

Every 5 second signature is helping towards achieving this, please spare some time to help those who are in need. A tragedy like this so close to Christmas is heartbreaking.

PLEASE DONATE VIA THIS WEBSITE
http://www.savehemsbycoastline.co.uk

If anyone would like to donate to save hemsby coastline, you can pay via barclays pingit ..shortcode pingitemy596 - it is free to use...Save Hemsby Coastline Bank account is also Barclays
Sort code is 20-53-06
Account number is 23898857

Please show your support! Every little helps!
